text:
Employees of a radio
or TV station which broadcasts news, advertising copy and other program
material received from outside the State are engaged in interstate commerce.
This is so even though all the station’s listeners and advertisers are located
within the State.
html: Employees of a radio or TV station which broadcasts news, advertising copy and other program material received from outside the State are engaged in interstate commerce. This is so even though all the station’s listeners and advertisers are located within the State.
